item.title: Using Traffic Data to Build Resilience: How Waze Supports Smarter Disaster Risk Management
item.description: With Wazeâ€™s support, the World Bank, in collaboration with University College London, validated a new traffic simulation model that identifies the most critical road segments in developing cities, helping governments prioritize climate-proofing and resilience investments.
